group_1.narration: It was wonderful to see them cheering so enthusiastically@for the feelings of their big sister figure, but...
Because Yachiyo was busy with her modeling job,@and Mifuyu with her studies,@they didn't seem to have any time for matters of love,@or any clue what to do.

But after hearing that their big sis@was thinking about inviting the one she loved on a date,@they wanted to make sure it was a success,@so they started talking more often@with the adults around them.

group_1.textLeft: Um, Mother...

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, well...for this project we have at school,@I just wanted to ask you a few questions...
...the assignment is to interview our families,@and gather information about all their 'Firsts'.
Uuhm...for example,@your first time riding a bike, and...
F-First time falling in love, and stuff like that...@So I thought I'd ask you about that...

group_1.textRight: You already know I've never ridden a bicycle,@do you not?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:110204:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Uu...y-yeah, that's right...

group_1.textRight: And you also know that I met your father through an arranged marriage.
Once the betrothal gifts were settled,@all of my time was devoted to training in order to become a homemaker.
It's not as if we had any time to waste on silly daydreams about love.
Does that information satisfy the requirements@for your project?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes...

group_1.textRight: Then hurry up and return to your room.
You have other things you need to be working on, correct?

group_1.textLeft: Y-Yes ma'am...!
Excuse me, Senpai.

group_1.textRight: Hm?@Oh, it's Yachiyo-chan~
What's up?@Do you have lessons today?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes, that's right, but...
There's something I wanted to ask you, Senpai.

group_1.textRight: Whaa?

group_1.textLeft: Let's say, you were going to hang out with someone@you really like.
What sort of place would you go to?

group_1.textRight: [chara:801000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]----nh?!
No way, Yachiyo-chan...are you in love?!@You're totally in love, aren't you?!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: If that's how it is, just leave it all to me!
Seek the advice of Kamihama's Greatest Love Helper, and...
[chara:801000:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I will see to it that you're in safe hands!

group_1.textLeft: S-Somehow you've completely gotten the@wrong idea...
It's oddly exhausting,@doing something we have no experience with at all...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
I'm sorry...@I couldn't find anything helpful on my end...

group_1.textLeft: It couldn't be helped.
I mean, I was completely clueless too.
My senpai at the office got so excited and energetic@the moment Love came up.

group_1.textRight: But still, you learned all sorts of info thanks to her, didn't you?

group_1.textLeft: Mhm, like her recommended shops and date spots@and such.
Oh, and she also lent me some local magazines afterwards.

group_1.textRight: Hmm...even after going through all these, I don't@really understand which things would be good...

group_1.textLeft: That's what it comes down to...@Neither of us knows a thing about being in love...

group_1.textRight: And giving Big Sis advice when we don't know@how right or wrong it is...
Maybe we're just troubling her more than we're helping...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.textRight: Can we talk for a moment, you two?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, Grandma...

group_1.textRight: I couldn't help but overhear you both talking@amongst yourselves...

group_1.textLeft: Please don't listen in on us like that...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry.
But I think it might be a good idea to just share everything you've learned with her at once.

group_1.textLeft: Eh, but...

group_1.textRight: That girl is the type who likes to work out her own solutions.
And it's better for her to have as many options as possible, I think.
I'm sure it'll make her happy just to know you've@been doing all this research for her, too.

group_1.textLeft: ...Alright, then.@We'll try talking with her.
